channel.title: Portfolio website for Nicolas Bossers
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Nicolas Bossers

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: CV
item.description: My international work and study experiences, charity work and hobbies

item.title: index
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries: At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nations’ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.

item.title: index
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries: At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nations’ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.

item.title: index
item.description: IMDB ratings: Differences between directors I would like you to explore whether the mean IMDB rating for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are the same or not. I will run a hypothesis test and calculate the confidence intervals for the mean ratings of these two directors. Null and alternative hypothesis: H0: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is equal to zero H1: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is not equal to zero

item.title: Spielburg vs Burton
item.description: I would like you to explore whether the mean IMDB rating for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are the same or not. I will run a hypothesis test and calculate the confidence intervals for the mean ratings of these two directors. Null and alternative hypothesis: H0: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is equal to zero. H1: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is not equal to zero.

item.title: US, Germany and India
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries: At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nations’ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.
